title: REFERRALS
ctaTextShort: Get one year FREE Marketplace Plus plan!
ctaText: Refer 10 of your friends to sign up for their profile and get the PLUS Marketplace Plan for free for one year.
chooseApp: Choose an app to share invitations...
copyContent: Or click on "Copy Link" and share the link with your friends.
howToShare: Once a friend clicks on the link and signs up for a profile you will see a new count above.
nowEligible: You are now eligible for a 1-Year Free PLUS Marketplace Plan.
step1: Click on the “Copy Link” button above
step2: Share the link with your friends
step3: Once your referral clicks on the link and registers, you will get closer to getting free membership!
msgContentShort:
Hi, 
have a look at ARTMO.  
Would be fantastic if you can join me there, a great art community with plenty exciting content.  
Looking forward to it :) Keep in touch
msgContent:
Hi, quickly sending you this...
 
Have a look at my ARTMO profile. 
 
Would be fantastic if you can join me there, a great art community with plenty exciting content. We can connect and follow each other. 
 Would be great :) I'm looking forward to it. 
Keep in touch
